activities: Digitech provides electronic content management (ECM) computer based service known as ImageSilo®, which is designed to help companies manage their company or customer information more efficiently and effectively.   Digitech does not own or control, collect, record, organize, use or otherwise disclose or make available to third parties the data that is stored through use of its ECM service by Customers, and such data is considered owned or controlled only by that Customer or the Customer’s representative, including if acting on behalf of the customer. Digitech should be considered only as a processor in behalf as to any personal data that may be considered transferred from the EU to the US subject to the requirements of the Safe Harbor Principles.  Digitech is not the collector or in control of any personal data, because it, neither alone nor jointly with others, will determine the purposes and means of collecting and the processing and uses of such data, and it should not be considered as acting in the capacity of data controller with attendant responsibilities.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
